OOC: I should have checked in earlier... Sorry about all the details
not be=
ing covered. Basically, I wanted to reintroduce an old character
and have a=
 go at the Minions. Preston, to help you out, Vorpal was
deliberately not f=
leshed out. He's a military Genius and a tyrant, but
little else is known. =
That's what makes him scary.

BIC:

The raider was almost on the brink of b=
reaking the atmosphere. Time to
get protected. He started transforming, tho=
usands of small pieces
moving into place as he rearranged his structure to =
that of a comet
just like the one he had ridden. The airless atmosphere of =
the Moon
was not much, but it was still dangerous without protection. He bu=
rned
his way downwards.

Once the burning stopped, it all went very fast. H=
e crashed landed and
created a crater in doing do.

Slowly after, he unfold=
ed and looked around. He finished transforming
and made his weapon systems =
were operational at full power.

???: MINIONS! I HAVE COME TO BRING YOU DEA=
TH! I AM THE REAPER THAT
WILL REMOVE YOUR STAIN ON THE UNIVERSE! FEAR ME, F=
OR I AM AZUREBLADE!

There. The challenge was issued. He readied his pulse =
cannon, his
missile launcher and his sword. This would be a day they'd wish=
 had
never come!
